Where have all my purchased issues gone?

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu
  2. Tap ‘Manage Account’
  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

When my digital subscription expires, do I keep the issues?

Yes, you own the issues for as long as you hold the account with Apple and use the associated Apple ID

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

When does my subscription renew?

You can view your Apple subscriptions via your account. For more information please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT202039

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I want to unsubscribe

Unfortunately, we cannot do this on your behalf. You’ll need to manage subscriptions via your account. For more information please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT202039

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I want to turn off auto renew

Unfortunately, we cannot do this on your behalf. You’ll need to manage subscriptions via your account. For more information please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT202039

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I signed up for a free trial but got charged straight away

Free trials and Introductory Pricing are only available once on the chosen subscription term.

For example, if you previously had a Free Trial on an annual subscription, you do not qualify for Introductory Pricing or further Free Trials.

You should always take care to read information on transactional popups before you purchase.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

  1. Open the App menu

  3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

I forgot my password

To reset your Apple ID password go to https://iforgot.apple.com/password/verify/appleid

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I don't know how I subscribed

If you subscribed by tapping a button in the app, your subscription will be with Apple. You can view your Apple subscriptions via your account please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT202039

The other way you could have subscribed is via our online website buysubscriptions.com. You should have an account set up with your email address. It may also be that you had a subscription as a gift through buysubscriptions.com. If so, the account may be in their name.

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.

  • Call 0800 123 4567
  • Submit a support request

I bought a subscription but the app is asking me to pay for my issue(s)

Any previous purchases you have made will be tied to your Apple ID. You can restore your previous purchases at any time.

What you need to do

2. Tap ‘Manage Account’

3. Tap ‘Restore Purchases’ and enter your Apple ID password if prompted

How do I view my subscription?

You can view your Apple subscriptions via your account. For more information please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT202039

How can I claim a refund if I'm not happy with something I've purchased?

For transactions made through the App Store (In App Purchases) we are not able to issue refunds. For information on how to claim a refund from Apple please visit https://support.apple.com/en-gb/HT204088

Already tried this?

If you are still experiencing the problem, contact support using any of the options below.
